articles.description: The 28-year-old has missed the Gunners' last two Premier League defeats against Brighton and Southampton after suffering a injury to his right thigh in a reverse at Crystal Palace.
articles.content:
Thomas Partey has handed Arsenal an injury boost after posting a video of him stepping up his rehabilitation.

articles.description: Sean Dyche was sacked by Burnley on Friday after nine-and-a-half years in charge at Turf Moor, bringing to an end the longest current managerial reign in the Premier League.
articles.content:
